description.value: VersionCode in correspondance messages must be filled in with a valid version key as specified. A correct version code is important, as recipient systems use it to decide which letter type a particular recipient handles. Derived from http://svn.medcom.dk/svn/releases/Standarder/Den%20gode%20korrespondance/XML/Dokumentation/XDIS91.pdf, see 'VersionCode'

display.value: The version number for MedCom correspondance messages
